entries.journal_entry_description: Return to Cargo Bay 1, kill 2 bocatts, and harvest their hide for Raylen.
entries.journal_entry_title: Acquire Bocatt Hide from Cargo Bay 1
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Take the elevator to the lower level to find the missing guard.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Lower Level
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Go into the lower cargo hold and kill at least 2 Bocatts and harvest their hide to bring back to Raylen.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Kill 2 Bocatts and Harvest Their Hides in Cargo Bay 1
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Once you have the harvested skins from the bocatts, use the elevator to return to the main level.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Main Level
